verses.verse: And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H5414>cried;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron:<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Would God <S%H3863>that<s%> we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt!<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> would <S%H3863>God<s%> we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness!<s%>

And <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> us <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> that our <S%H802>wives<s%> and our <S%H2945>children<s%> should <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H957>prey?<s%> were it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>
And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> Let us <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H7218>captain,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> which were <S%H4480>of<s%> them that <S%H8446>searched<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> their clothes: <S%H899><s%>

And they <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>company<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we passed <S%H5674>through<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> it, is an <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in us, then he will <S%H935>bring<s%> us <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it us; a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> ye against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H3899>bread<s%> for us: their <S%H6738>defense<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> us: <S%H3372>fear<s%> them <S%H408>not.<s%>

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>bade<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones.<s%> And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> will <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5006>provoke<s%> me? and how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> will it be <S%H3808>ere<s%> they <S%H539>believe<s%> me, for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them?

I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> them with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and <S%H3423>disinherit<s%> them, and will <S%H6213>make<s%> of thee a <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, <S%H3588>(for<s%> thou broughtest <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> in thy <S%H3581>might<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> them;)

And they will <S%H559>tell<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> for they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> art <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> art <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5869>face<s%> to <S%H5869>face,<s%> and that thy <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>standeth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and that <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1980>goest<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, by day <S%H3119>time<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Now if thou shalt <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H853>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8088>fame<s%> of thee will <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1115><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto them therefore he hath <S%H7819>slain<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now,<s%> I beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let the <S%H3581>power<s%> of my <S%H136>Lord<s%> be <S%H1431>great,<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H750>longsuffering,<s%> <S%H639><s%> and of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and by no means <S%H5352>clearing<s%> <S%H5352><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the guilty, <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H8029>third<s%> and <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation.

Pardon, <S%H5545><s%> I beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> according unto the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> from <S%H4480>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714><s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2008>now.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H5545>pardoned<s%> according to thy word: <S%H1697><s%>
But as <S%H199>truly<s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those <S%H376>men<s%> which have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and my <S%H226>miracles,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and have <S%H5254>tempted<s%> me now <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice;<s%>

Surely <S%H518><s%> they shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H3605>any<s%> of them that <S%H5006>provoked<s%> me <S%H7200>see<s%> it:

But my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and hath followed me <S%H4390>fully,<s%> <S%H310><s%> him will I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whereinto<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H935>went;<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

(Now the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley.)<s%> <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> you, and <S%H5265>get<s%> you into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall I bear with <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me? I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, As truly as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> ye have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in mine <S%H241>ears,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to you:

Your <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of you, according to your <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me,

Doubtless <S%H518><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> concerning <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to make you <S%H7931>dwell<s%> therein, <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>

But your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H559>said<s%> should <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H957>prey,<s%> them will I bring <S%H935>in,<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye have <S%H3988>despised.<s%>
But as for <S%H859>you,<s%> your <S%H6297>carcasses,<s%> they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H1961>wander<s%> <S%H7462><s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H2184>whoredoms,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> your <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> be <S%H8552>wasted<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

After the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H8446>searched<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> each day for a <S%H3117>year,<s%> <S%H8141><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%> shall ye <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> my breach of <S%H8569>promise.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>said,<s%> I will <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>it<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that are gathered <S%H3259>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me: in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> they shall be <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> who <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H853>made<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, by bringing <S%H3318>up<s%> a <S%H1681>slander<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%>

Even those <S%H376>men<s%> that did bring <S%H3318>up<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> upon the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H4046>plague<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> which were <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> still.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>sayings<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

And they rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and got them <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Lo,<s%> we be here, and will go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>promised:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> <S%H2088>now<s%> do <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5674>transgress<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> but <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>

Go not <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you; that ye be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> are <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and ye shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> ye are turned <S%H7725>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you.

But they <S%H6075>presumed<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H7218>top:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4185>departed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H7130><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
